borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T4787: Carpinus betulus : cut back off building to provide minimum 1m clearance.Reason: Is raising tree grille - is nearly touching adjacent building. lots of minor bark wounds on stem.T4788: Carpinus betulus ; raise lower canopy to 3m.Reason;terminal bark wounds at abse and lower stem - comprehensive bark loss evident - exposed is still sound. low canopy.T4789: Carpinus betulus: raise lower canopy to 3m, remove dead branches and cut back off building to provide minimum 1m clearance.Reason; low canopy- some detached branches stuck in lower canopy - s nearly touching building.T4786: Carpinus betulus : cut back off building to provide minimum 1m clearance.Reason: congested fork at 2m - southeast lower laterals rubbing against adjacent building.T4785: Carpinus betulus: remove stake and remove tree grille.Reason: congested unions at 1.5m with included bark-minor adaptive growth visible. Obsolete stake present and is lifting tree grille.
